website_summaries.verdict: At a 2-pack deal, this kayak is easy enough for kids to handle on the water but still long enough for an adult to enjoy.
pros: Has a lot of footrest sizes for users of a variety of heights
A great choice for a teen or older child
Not very heavy for its size
Nice 8-foot length provides more versatility than some other models for kids
cons: It's a little heavier than other kayaks made for kids
While a child can use this on the water it will likely be too heavy to carry on land

website_summaries.verdict: This is a durable option for a mid-sized person that comes in a set of 2 at this price.
pros: comes with a seat back for comfort
Has several foot positions for people of varying heights
Good for teens or smaller adults
Chair back feature makes longer rides easier
cons: The back support strap tends to loosen as you use it and may need to be tightened occasionally

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these about a month ago. The kayaks are easy to use, sturdy, and very functional. We have really enjoyed paddling around our lake! We have a dog that swims with us, and I can have him climb on the front section of the kayak with me in the seat area. I can paddle around with him sitting in the front area. The dog is about 80 pounds, so he is not little. The kayak is very stable in the water. They came with paddles, which are suitable. Lot of fun! Reasonably priced, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Kayaks (2 Pack purchase)
customer_reviews.text: Tried this kayak out at Elephant Butte Lake State Park and I am really satisfied with how it handles and the fact that I can get on and off easy. Comparing it to an inflatable (Intex K2) I can go into areas to explore where I’d doubt and wouldn’t go with the K2 due to puncture incidents...a definite plus seeming I enjoy doing just that. The support from the seat is a big jump as compared to the K2. I can also sit crisscrossed or extend my legs out. I’m 5’10 @ 215 lbs. No challenges from this to complain about. A fun new hobby to enjoy. Hope this review helps out.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Alma San Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for first time kayakers.
customer_reviews.text: My very first kayak. It's VERY sturdy in the water (yes, I did try to tip it over) and it's comfortable. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: 1 sunk, but the others a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! For the maybe 10 minutes I was in it before I started to sink. There is a hole in the hull, and the kayak filled up with water immediately, and I had to drag it swimming through the river. Hopefully, I can get a replacement, because I had been looking forward to today for a month. It’s spacious, holds a cooler, and has a cup holder. Love the groves to hold the paddles and help secure the strap for transport. The paddles are not the best, but they work, just get some paddles you like. I felt like they were to short.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: When I tried to adjust the straps for the backrest ...
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to adjust the straps for the backrest, they just popped out. Definitely not secured properly to the boat. Haven't used it because I need someone strong to fix it. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Care N

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: These are our first kayaks and we could not be happier. Very easy to transport with the light weight. On the water the perform well. I easily upgraded mine for fishing with some accessories. Extra handles and a paddle clip make things much easier. I was worried about comfort as I am 6' 3" but no problems finding a comfortable position.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Great all around kayak.
customer_reviews.text: For an nice day on the lake, cove, ocean bay, or a easy river, this is a terrific kayak. Super stable, you can nap on this one! Easy to carry, lift, and load on my SUV, too. The flat stern is great is I need to store them standing.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Geraci

customer_reviews.title: This boat is slow, but very stable for a kayak
customer_reviews.text: The boat is wide, and has a squared off stern. It is quite stable. Most kayaks have a fine, pointed, bow and stern. My wife never raced paddle boats (I did), but she is faster than me in her SunDolphin, which cost about half the pandemic price paid for this boat
customer_reviews.author: Robert Osthues

customer_reviews.title: Good kayaks for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Slightly heavier than expected. Turn very easily in the water, but don’t track quite as straight as longer kayaks If you want to go fast. .
customer_reviews.author: J Marnocha

customer_reviews.title: Low lotus.
customer_reviews.text: Ok but not great. Sits low in water. Uncomfortable for people w long legs. If you can, go w the 10 foot.
customer_reviews.author: Tomkat

customer_reviews.title: Great for Me and My Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I had a paddle-board that I used to take the dogs out on but it was too difficult to maneuver sitting down and they knocked me over if I stood. This is perfect for the 3 of us. So happy with the purchase. Delivery was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Ardolino

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a hard-shell kayak that I could fit in my Chevy Equinox...this is the one! I can actually fit two in and have a passenger in my back seat! I am 57, 5'6", 130 lbs. and have kayaked quite a bit. This is light enough for me to manage easily by myself. It is not super fast, but I get on the lake for enjoyment and exercise, not speed. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marilee

customer_reviews.title: Fun little kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle in the water. Very stable. The back offers good support and makes longer rides comfortable. It is not as easy to carry around and load in the car as I expected. It's doable though.
customer_reviews.author: carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: I use my kayak along the shoreline of the beach. Some days there are waves that can knock over the kayak, but if you face the wave when it’s approaching the kayak can withstand small waves. I’m enjoying kayaking year round in Miami Beach! I am pretty comfortable but I think the seat and foot rest could be improved. I’m not that strong and I’m able to carry the kayak but would prefer if it had a handle or better grip for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Eloisa Menes

customer_reviews.title: Love this kayak even at 70!
customer_reviews.text: We love these kayaks. We've taken them in the ocean, the Colorado River and Lakes. Too bad they’re out of stock for now. they are great, even for a 69 year old novice kayaker.
customer_reviews.author: SciFi Fan

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: The bracket that holds the chair back to the kayak popped off. It is a little piece which was lost when it happened. I have had zero luck contacting their parts department for over three weeks. Very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: EAD

customer_reviews.title: Good cruiser for short fun
customer_reviews.text: Good for smaller people who just want to paddle around. Not for a long distance trip. My husband is 6’1 225lb and it was not a comfortable ride for him.
customer_reviews.author: Zatata

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was rough but the product is great
customer_reviews.text: Came in scuffed and scratched which sucked. I’m Sure I’ll scratch it up in use anyway but when you buy something new it should be perfect when it arrives. The handle to carry it is actually in the center of the kayak not on the outside. It’s durable, light and the perfect size for someone who is just over 5 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Motti

customer_reviews.title: Cheap seats but still lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic mechanisms holding the seats on aren't super strong but the kayaks are easy to use and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Loruham

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kayak.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of kayaks. This one’s the best. It’s just perfect for every event. Very functional and versatile. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janet McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Was looking for a kayak that my 4 yo and I could use; could fit in my Jeep Grand Cherokee; and I, a smaller woman, could easily carry. It’s everything I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Silcox

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome for the beginning kayaker
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome for the beginning kayaker! Was considering buying a double, but these were the better choice. Easy-ish to carry, although I wish it had handles on both ends. Light, durable, hard to flip! My 240 lb dad was able to ride it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun? Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Buy a cushion and you're good to go for hours!! Love my new kayaks.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Carver

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime customer service came through!
customer_reviews.text: One of my kayaks came damaged and their customer service department took care of me. I think the kayaks are easy to use and worth what they cost, easily. My mother feels comfortable on one and she is uncomfortable on the water, usually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swell boat
customer_reviews.text: Simple, durable, light enough for single out-of-shape adventurer interested in short excursions on local ponds
customer_reviews.author: Julia Stavenhagen

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good little kayak
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good little kayak. It isn't the best quality, but it works for what I want it to do. I take it in the river and bayou just fine. But it is a little iffy in the gulf.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: I bought this kayak for its weight and price
customer_reviews.text: The kayak is perfect for me It is light enough for me to carry and just the right size for my small lake So much fun and good exercise I bought 2 so I can go with a friend
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to get it,got lost once. Glad we tried again. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hammond

customer_reviews.title: No scupper hole plugs
customer_reviews.text: Nice kayaks, are there supposed to be plugs for the scupper holes if so none came with the kayaks.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B

customer_reviews.title: Lotus sit on top kayak
customer_reviews.text: The two pack of kayaks was the best deal and the quality is outstanding. Perfect for some outdoor quarantine activity.
customer_reviews.author: ASC

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's lightweight, and it's a sit-on-top model. It's durable and easy to maneuver. A set of 2 has good value
customer_reviews.author: H. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver, not too heavy. Love the color. Seats could be a little more comfortable if you are out more than 1.5 hours
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nickel

customer_reviews.title: great boat crumby paddle
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the Lifetime Wave for people under 130 lbs. While I enjoy it very much, the bigger one offers better control, a backrest, and a more efficient ride. The paddle on both the wave and the lotus are pretty pathetic, though. I liken it to paddling with a wooden spoon. This is my first season kayaking (lake), and I love it. It's nice to find an activity that is inexpensive, interesting, and good for my health.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value at this price point. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kelly

customer_reviews.title: No hookup for fishing poles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these kayaks for my parents for Christmas and they loved them! No damage received during shipping and handling, they are perfect size for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Nealy

customer_reviews.title: Problem.
customer_reviews.text: I order a set of two and have only received one of them. Missing one kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J Hart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Great to have two for double the fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kayaks. Received them missing a piece that holds the seat in place
customer_reviews.text: I like the kayaks. However when I received them I was missing the grey piece that hold the seat in place. I only had that piece missing on 1 of the 2 kayaks
customer_reviews.author: Harris Avery

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Kayaks!
customer_reviews.text: Great kayaks for family use. Kids and adults alike all love these. Easy to use and durable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bumbaca

customer_reviews.title: Seat Back Screw Missing
customer_reviews.text: Of the four Lifetime Lotus 8 foot kayaks delivered, one was missing a screw that secures the seat back.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We just spent 3 weeks in these kayaks on Jackson Lake, Teton Park. Both adults and kids as young as 5 paddled and played. I had so many people stop us to ask about them. Of course I bragged up Lifetime and Amazon. They were delivered in time and right to our door. Yes, I will be buying more for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: D. Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Kayak with hole in it
customer_reviews.text: Product had a huge gash in the bottom of it. Looks like it’s been thrown around
customer_reviews.author: Seth Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great Little kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kayak! Took it out for the first time and did a little fishing. Very stable, but I didn't chance anything because the water is pretty cold right now. Had no problems maneuvering and casting my rod. Can't wait to take it out again! When mine arrived, there was only one scupper plug in boat. Don't know if it was supposed to have all of them included. I went to sporting goods store and bought some foam golf balls. Works perfect for scupper plugs.
customer_reviews.author: kloudking1

customer_reviews.title: It is a great stable kayak for leisure paddling in our bay and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these. Is it a professional kayak? No. It is a great stable kayak for leisure paddling in our bay and river though and we all enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: We love this Kayak-It is everything it said it was-light weight ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this Kayak-It is everything it said it was-light weight and very maneuverable. It's very stable is the water. A wonderful kayak for a nice day. It's great for small lakes with smooth water.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy L

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: It's still too cold in GA to try it out, but delivery was excellent and the kayak looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my brother and his wife. They loved them. I bought plugs for them, but they said that they didn’t end up needing them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Lifetime Lotus Sit-On-Top Kayak with Paddle
product_meta.description: The 8 ft. Lifetime Lotus™ Kayak is the perfect adult length, providing convenient transportation and storage options. Its compact design easily fits inside the average apartment or home closet, and the flat back end allows the kayak to stand upright. Optional add-on items transform the standard Lotus™ into the “do it all” kayak. Includes hard adjustable backrest. From paddling and fishing to surfing and even sailing, the Lotus™ is perfect for your outdoor adventure.
feature_bullets: Kayak Paddle included. Hull design provides ultra stability and great tracking
Multiple footrest positions for different size Paddlers. Includes hard adjustable backrest
Scupper holes drain Cockpit area. Molded Paddle cradle. Easy carry handle
Tank well storage with bungee cord lacing to secure loose items. Durable high-density Polyethylene (HDPE) construction
Lightweight 38 lb. Design. 5-Year limited warranty. UV-Protected - will Not fade, crack, or peel
